narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Fulgent Therapeutics Llc. is a Clinical Medical Laboratory provider based in El Monte, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $84.9M in Medicaid payments across 2.3M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $84.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
